pages.text: Thought to be fairy tales, these omens of death are very real and loyal to their summoner.
One can call upon a loyal black wolf through the use of a $(l:focuses/wild/hunting_focus)Hunting Focus$(), or through a ritual which summons one without a limited lifespan.
Right-clicking on a loyal Black Wolf with meat will heal them.
Summoning Black Wolves through certain ways may also yield variants of the beast or even other types of hounds.

An undead version of regular wolves, though unlike them, these wolves may emit a howl that boosts the damage of their skeleton allies. They are summoned by casting $(l:focuses/wild/hunting_focus)Hunting spell$() with a $(l:crafts/necro_staff)Necro Staff$(), or through another ritual.
